name: Cat Image Bot
description: This is a Telegram Bot Send Photo of cats every 10 mins

SESSION_STRING.description: Generate Session String and add to heroku or secrets

API_ID.description: Go to https://my.telegram.org for getting it

API_HASH.description: Go to https://my.telegram.org for getting it

BOT_TOKEN.description: Create it with help of BotFather

LOGGING_CHANNEL.description: Give your bot permission in Logging channel and get ID of the channel begins with -
